snippet: For those whose children were killed a year ago at Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Conn., the scars remain raw with every memorial and in everyday encounters.
abstract: Scars remain for those whose children were killed one year ago at Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting in Newtown, Conn; visual memorials and even everyday encounters with neighbors can open raw wounds; many wish process of healing could move on without scrutiny of media and nation.
lead_paragraph: For those whose children were killed a year ago at Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Conn., the scars remain raw with every memorial and in everyday encounters.

headline.main: A Year of Painful, Daily Reminders in Newtown
headline.print_headline: A Year of Painful, Daily Reminders in Newtown
